info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 13 at 8:17PM EDT until May 13 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg VA
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of south central and west central Virginia, including the following counties, in south central Virginia, Bedford. In west central Virginia, Franklin.
* WHEN...Until 1015 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain had fallen with amounts of 1 to 3 inches. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Blackwater River, Back Creek, Bore Auger Creek and Big Otter River. Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bedford... Rocky Mount... Boones Mill... Stewartsville... Montvale... Ferrum... Goodview... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.
